Resilient Systems REST API: IncidentArtifactDTO

IncidentArtifactDTO Data Type

Contains information about an incident artifact.

Properties
name data type description
id number The artifact ID.
type ObjectHandle The type of the artifact. See constDTO.artifact_types for a list of all possible values.
value string The value of the artifact. This would be, for example, the IP address for an IP address artifact. When adding artifacts, the value can include multiple whitespace-separated values in this text field if the artifact type's is_multi_aware flag is true (see constDTO.artifact_types)
description TextContentDTO Gets the artifact's description.
creator JustUserDTO Gets the creator of this artifact
hits array of ThreatHitDTO Read-only field containing a list of all of the threat source hits for this artifact.
attachment AttachmentDTO The artifact attachment (null indicates that the artifact has no attachment).
parent_id number The parent artifact ID.
inc_id number The incident ID.
inc_name string The incident name.
inc_owner ObjectHandle The incident owner.
created number The date/time the artifact was created.
pending_sources array of object The IDs of any threat sources that are still in the process of being checked for this artifact.
perms IncidentArtifactPermsDTO The current user's read/write/delete permissions are.
properties array of IncidentArtifactPropertyDTO Additional artifact properties
location IncidentArtifactLocationDTO The location of the incident artifact
whois WhoisDTO
actions array of ActionInfoDTO The list of actions available to the caller for execution.
relating boolean Whether or not this artifact should be used for relating to other incidents. Null means use the default specified by the type, true to always relate, false to never relate.

Example

{
  "id" : 12345,
  "type" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "value" : "...",
  "description" : {
    "format" : "text",
    "content" : "..."
  },
  "creator" : {
    "id" : 12345,
    "fname" : "...",
    "lname" : "...",
    "status" : { },
    "email" : "...",
    "phone" : "...",
    "cell" : "...",
    "title" : "...",
    "notes" : "...",
    "last_login" : 12345,
    "locked" : true,
    "is_external" : true
  },
  "hits" : [ {
    "id" : "...",
    "value" : "...",
    "threat_source_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "artifact_type_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "active" : true
  }, {
    "id" : "...",
    "value" : "...",
    "threat_source_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "artifact_type_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "active" : true
  } ],
  "attachment" : {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "content_type" : "...",
    "created" : 12345,
    "creator_id" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "size" : 12345,
    "vers" : 12345,
    "actions" : [ {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    }, {
      "id" : 12345,
      "name" : "...",
      "enabled" : true
    } ],
    "inc_id" : 12345,
    "inc_name" : "...",
    "inc_owner" : {
      "id" : { },
      "name" : "..."
    },
    "task_id" : 12345,
    "task_name" : "...",
    "type" : "artifact"
  },
  "parent_id" : 12345,
  "inc_id" : 12345,
  "inc_name" : "...",
  "inc_owner" : {
    "id" : { },
    "name" : "..."
  },
  "created" : 12345,
  "pending_sources" : [ { }, { } ],
  "perms" : {
    "read" : true,
    "write" : true,
    "delete" : true
  },
  "properties" : [ {
    "name" : "...",
    "value" : "..."
  }, {
    "name" : "...",
    "value" : "..."
  } ],
  "location" : {
    "latlng" : {
      "lat" : 12345.0,
      "lng" : 12345.0
    },
    "city" : "...",
    "state" : "...",
    "country" : "...",
    "postalCode" : "..."
  },
  "whois" : {
    "raw" : "...",
    "pending" : true,
    "invalid" : true
  },
  "actions" : [ {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "enabled" : true
  }, {
    "id" : 12345,
    "name" : "...",
    "enabled" : true
  } ],
  "relating" : true
}
